argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2cpm.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2cpm.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 3 |  | m2cpm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | m2cpm.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 5 |  | m2cpmghm.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | m2cpmghm.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 7 |  | m2cpmghm.u | |- U = ( C |`s S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 9 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 | #P_mat2pmatmhm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` C ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_cpmatsrgpmat | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. ( SubRing ` C ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` C ) = ( mulGrp ` C ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_subrgsubm | |- ( S e. ( SubRing ` C ) -> S e. ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` C ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 12, 14 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> S e. ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` C ) ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_m2cpmf | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B --> S ) |
| 17 |  | #P_frn | |- ( T : B --> S -> ran T C_ S ) |
| 18 | 11, 16, 17 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ran T C_ S ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( N Mat P ) e. _V |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_eqeltri | |- C e. _V |
| 21 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( N ConstPolyMat R ) e. _V |
| 22 | 1, 21 | #P_eqeltri | |- S e. _V |
| 23 | 7, 13 | #P_mgpress | |- ( ( C e. _V /\ S e. _V ) -> ( ( mulGrp ` C ) |`s S ) = ( mulGrp ` U ) ) |
| 24 | 20, 22, 23 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( mulGrp ` C ) |`s S ) = ( mulGrp ` U ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( mulGrp ` U ) = ( ( mulGrp ` C ) |`s S ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_resmhm2b | |- ( ( S e. ( SubMnd ` ( mulGrp ` C ) ) /\ ran T C_ S ) -> ( T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` C ) ) <-> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` U ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 15, 18, 26 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` C ) ) <-> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` U ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 9, 27 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` U ) ) ) |
